title: Water right applicant: annual fee: exemption.
subject: Waterrightapplicant
annualfee
exemption

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law requires each person or entity who holds a permit or license to appropriate water, leases water pursuant to specified provisions of law, or files a specified application, registration, or petition to pay a fee according to a fee schedule established by the State Water Resources Control Board.

This bill would require the board to exempt a water right applicant from paying the annual fee pursuant to a specified regulation for a pond with 20 acre-feet or less of water.

actions.description: From printer. May be heard in committee March 16.

extras.impact_clause: An act to add Section 1526 to the Water Code, relating to water.
